item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司任命哈坎-塞缪尔森（Hakan Samuelsson）为新任首席执行官
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司周日表示，已任命哈坎-塞缪尔森（Hakan Samuelsson）为新任首席执行官，自 2025 年 4 月 1 日起生效。【原文：Volvo Cars has appointed Hakan Samuelsson as its new chief executive, effective April 1, 2025, it said on Sunday.】

item.title: 如果无法就乌克兰问题达成协议，特朗普威胁对俄罗斯石油征收二次关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日表示，如果他认为莫斯科阻碍了他结束乌克兰战争的努力，他将对所有俄罗斯石油征收 25% 至 50% 的二级关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday he will impose secondary tariffs of 25% to 50% on all Russian oil if he feels Moscow is blocking his efforts to end the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 澳大利亚预测美元走低将打击资源和能源出口收益
item.description: 澳大利亚政府周一表示，随着关键的铁矿石运输价格下降，澳大利亚矿业和能源出口收入预计将在截至 6 月份的财政年度下降 6%。【原文：Australia's mining and energy export earnings are expected to fall 6% in the financial year through June, with prices of its key iron ore shipments declining, the government said on Monday.】

item.title: 为什么特朗普的汽车关税会伤害他的工人阶级支持者？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对进口汽车征收 25% 关税的政策对工薪阶层的汽车买家打击最大，因为几乎所有在美国销售的低成本新车都是在其他地方生产的。【原文：Working-class car buyers will be the hardest hit by U.S. President Donald Trump’s 25% tariff on imported vehicles because almost all low-cost new cars sold in the United States are built elsewhere.】

item.title: 第一季度的市场：一切都被 "特朗普化 "了！
item.description: 大多数投资者都知道，鉴于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普重新掌权世界最大的经济体和金融市场，今年的形势可能会变得动荡不安，但很少有人预料到今年的形势会像迄今为止的这种 "圈地运动"。【原文：Most investors knew things could turn turbulent this year given U.S. President Donald Trump's return to power in the world's biggest economy and financial market, but few predicted the kind of a rodeo ride it has been so far.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称，日本将给予加密资产作为金融产品的合法地位
item.description: 日经商业日报》周日称，日本金融厅计划修订《金融商品交易法》，赋予加密资产作为金融产品的合法地位。【原文：Japan's Financial Services Agency plans to revise the Financial Instruments and Exchange Act to give crypto assets a legal status as financial products, the Nikkei business daily said on Sunday.】

item.title: 印度法院驳回 JSW 钢铁公司和 Trafigura 关于批准某些焦炭进口的请求
item.description: 一份法院命令显示，印度一家法院拒绝了 JSW 钢铁公司和 Trafigura 提出的允许某些炼钢原料装运的请求，这是在新德里出台限制进口的新政策后该行业遭受的最新挫折。【原文：An Indian court has declined requests from JSW Steel and Trafigura to allow certain shipments of a steelmaking raw material, a court order showed, the latest setback after New Delhi's new policy curbing imports rattled the sector.】

item.title: 特朗普告诉美国全国广播公司（NBC），他 "不在乎 "汽车制造商是否因关税而涨价
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周六表示，他没有警告汽车业高管在对外国制造的汽车征收关税生效时不要提价，并告诉美国全国广播公司新闻（NBC News）他 "不在乎 "汽车业高管是否提价。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Saturday he did not warn car industry executives against raising prices as tariffs on foreign-made autos come into force, telling NBC News he "couldn't care less" if they do.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国将撤销对委内瑞拉国家石油公司（PDVSA）外国合作伙伴的授权
item.description: 接近美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府决定的消息人士周六表示，美国政府已通知委内瑞拉国家石油公司（PDVSA）的外国合作伙伴，即将取消允许他们出口委内瑞拉石油和副产品的授权。【原文：The U.S. government has notified foreign partners of Venezuela's state oil company PDVSA of the imminent cancellation of authorizations that allow them to export Venezuelan oil and byproducts, sources close to the decision by President Donald Trump's administration said on Saturday.】

item.title: 巴西肉类加工企业 JBS 将斥资 1 亿美元在越南建造两家工厂
item.description: 巴西肉类包装商 JBS 周六宣布，将投资 1 亿美元在越南建设两家工厂，旨在扩大其在东南亚的业务，巩固其在全球市场的地位。【原文：Brazilian meatpacker JBS announced on Saturday that it will invest US$100 million to build two factories in Vietnam, aiming to expand its presence in Southeast Asia and strengthen its position in the global market.】

item.title: 消息人士称，ING 在欧洲扩张计划中与意大利 Popolare di Sondrio 公司会面
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，ING集团最近几周会见了意大利的Banca Popolare di Sondrio公司，该公司正寻求通过收购在欧洲发展。【原文：ING Groep met with Italy's Banca Popolare di Sondrio in recent weeks as it seeks to grow in Europe through takeovers, a person with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Poste 同意收购维旺迪持有的大部分意大利电信股份的广泛条款
item.description: 三位与此事关系密切的消息人士周六透露，意大利邮政已与维旺迪达成广泛协议，将收购该法国集团在意大利电信的大部分股份，并成为其主要投资者。【原文：Poste Italiane has agreed broad terms with Vivendi to buy the bulk of the French group's stake in Telecom Italia and become its main investor, three sources close to the matter said on Saturday.】

item.title: Glass Lewis 建议投票 "反对 "高盛首席执行官薪酬
item.description: 代理顾问格拉斯-刘易斯（Glass Lewis）建议投资者对高盛高管的薪酬投 "反对 "票，理由是这家华尔街银行 "仍然无法将薪酬与业绩挂钩"，而且格拉斯-刘易斯称高盛的留任津贴过高。【原文：Proxy adviser Glass Lewis recommended investors cast advisory votes "against" the pay of top Goldman Sachs executives, citing the Wall Street bank's "continued inability to align pay with performance" and retention grants that Glass Lewis called excessive.】

item.title: 官员称印度和美国在达成贸易协定方面取得进展
item.description: 印度和美国官员周六表示，在新德里举行的几天会谈中，双方在达成双边贸易协定方面取得了进展。【原文：Indian and U.S. officials made progress towards a bilateral trade agreement during several days of talks in New Delhi, they said on Saturday.】

item.title: 特朗普为 Ozy Media 创始人沃森减刑近 10 年
item.description: 白宫周五表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普已为 Ozy Media 创始人卡洛斯-沃森减刑，他因在其现已倒闭的初创公司中欺诈投资者而被判入狱近 10 年。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has commuted Ozy Media founder Carlos Watson's nearly 10-year prison sentence for defrauding investors in his now-defunct startup, the White House said on Friday.】

item.title: Stellantis 公司高管表示，2025 年还将从特斯拉 "资金池 "中购买二氧化碳信用额度
item.description: Stellantis 集团欧洲区负责人周六表示，尽管布鲁塞尔给了汽车制造商三年的时间来遵守欧盟的二氧化碳减排要求，但该集团还将在 2025 年从特斯拉牵头的 "池子 "中购买信用额度，以满足欧盟的减排要求。【原文：Stellantis will buy credits from a "pool" led by Tesla also in 2025, to meet European Union's CO2 reduction requirements, despite Brussels giving carmakers three years to comply, the group's Europe head said on Saturday.】

item.title: 据《华盛顿邮报》报道，特朗普在 4 月 2 日之前向顾问施压，要求关税升级
item.description: 华盛顿邮报》周六援引四位熟知内情的人士的话报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正在敦促高级顾问在关税问题上采取更加激进的立场，因为美国政府正在为全球贸易战的重大升级做准备。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is urging senior advisers to take a more aggressive stance on tariffs as the administration prepares for a major escalation in its global trade war, the Washington Post reported on Saturday, citing four people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国国家媒体将长江和记巴拿马港口交易比喻为 "向对手递刀
item.description: 中国国家媒体周六批评了香港企业集团长江和记将巴拿马运河附近港口出售给贝莱德领导的集团的计划，此前一天，中国市场监管部门对该交易展开了调查。【原文：Chinese state media on Saturday criticised Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison's plan to sell its ports near the Panama Canal to a BlackRock-led group, a day after China's market regulator launched a probe into the deal.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行收购 Banco BPM 获得欧洲央行批准，将权衡各种选择
item.description: 意大利第二大银行意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）已获得欧洲中央银行授权，以 140 亿欧元全股收购规模较小的竞争对手 Banco BPM 银行。【原文：UniCredit , Italy's second-biggest bank, has received European Central Bank authorisation for its 14 billion euro all-share offer to buy smaller rival Banco BPM .】

item.title: 美国警告法国公司必须遵守特朗普的多样性禁令
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士说，特朗普政府已致函持有美国政府合同的法国公司，命令它们遵守一项禁止多元化、公平和包容计划的行政命令。【原文：The Trump administration has written to French companies holding U.S. government contracts ordering them to comply with an executive order banning diversity, equity and inclusion programmes, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 不再 "贫穷但性感？柏林经济崛起的代价
item.description: 塔切莱斯艺术之家曾是柏林另类艺术和文化场景的中心，这座位于首都中心的五层建筑令人印象深刻，其历史可追溯到 1908 年，柏林墙倒塌后被艺术家们占据。【原文：The Art House Tacheles used to be the epicentre of the alternative art and culture scene in Berlin, an impressive five-storey building in the heart of the capital dating back to 1908 and occupied by artists after the fall of the Berlin Wall.】

item.title: 自由亚洲电台称，如无法院干预，该台将于 4 月底全面关闭
item.description: 自由亚洲电台周五表示，如果法院不阻止特朗普政府削减其资金，该电台将于 4 月底关闭。【原文：Radio Free Asia said on Friday it would shut down by the end of April if the courts did not prevent the Trump administration from cutting its funding.】

item.title: 特朗普表示愿意就关税问题达成协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，他对与寻求避免美国关税的国家达成交易持开放态度，但这些协议必须在他的政府于4月2日宣布对等关税之后再进行谈判。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday that he was open to carving out deals with countries seeking to avoid U.S. tariffs but those agreements would have to be negotiated after his administration announces reciprocal tariffs on April 2.】

item.title: 合规主管称瑞银无意离开瑞士
item.description: 瑞银合规与治理主管马库斯-朗纳（Markus Ronner）周五表示，瑞银没有离开瑞士的计划，因为瑞士正在讨论如何监管这家瑞士最大的银行。【原文：UBS has no plans to leave Switzerland, the bank's compliance and governance chief Markus Ronner said on Friday amid a debate on how to regulate the country's biggest lender.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，联邦调查局正在调查甲骨文公司的网络攻击事件
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引一位熟悉此事的人士的话报道，联邦调查局正在调查甲骨文公司的网络攻击事件，因为黑客侵入了这家云计算公司的计算机系统并窃取了病人的数据。【原文：The Federal Bureau of Investigation is probing the cyberattack at Oracle as the hackers broke into the cloud computing company's computer systems and stole patient data, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据 Business Insider 报道，Scale AI 在潜在要约收购中寻求高达 250 亿美元的估值
item.description: 据《商业内幕》（Business Insider）周五援引多个消息来源报道，人工智能初创公司 Scale AI 正在潜在的要约收购中寻求高达 250 亿美元的估值，因为它希望利用对该技术的蓬勃需求。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Scale AI is seeking a valuation as high as $25 billion in a potential tender offer as it looks to capitalize on the booming demand for the technology, Business Insider reported on Friday, citing multiple sources.】

item.title: OpenAI 必须在年底前完成营利转型，才能筹集到 400 亿美元的全部资金
item.description: 一位熟知内情的人士周五表示，OpenAI 必须在今年年底前转型为一家营利性公司，以确保获得由软银牵头的 400 亿美元全额融资，该公司的融资已进入最后阶段。【原文：OpenAI must transition to a for-profit company by the end of the year to secure the full $40 billion funding led by SoftBank it is in the final stages of raising, a person familiar with the matter said on Friday.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克必须就披露 Twitter 股份一事面对欺诈诉讼
item.description: 一名美国法官周五驳回了亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）要求驳回一项诉讼的请求，马斯克声称，他在披露对社交媒体公司推特（现名 X）的初始投资时等待了太长时间，从而欺骗了推特的前股东。【原文：A U.S. judge on Friday rejected billionaire Elon Musk's bid to dismiss a lawsuit claiming he had defrauded former Twitter shareholders by waiting too long to disclose his initial investment in the social media company, now known as X.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 以 450 亿美元收购社交媒体平台 X
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周五表示，他的 xAI 已经以 450 亿美元（包括债务）的全股票交易收购了社交媒体应用程序 X，该应用程序的前身是 Twitter。【原文：Elon Musk said on Friday that his xAI has acquired X, the social media app formerly known as Twitter, in an all-stock transaction for $45 billion, including debt.】

item.title: 独家报道：Blackstone 评估入股美国 TikTok 分拆公司
item.description: 据两位熟悉此事的人士透露，私募股权投资公司 Blackstone 正在评估对 TikTok 的美国业务进行少量少数股权投资。【原文：Private equity firm Blackstone is evaluating taking a small minority investment in TikTok's U.S. operations, according to two people familiar with the matter.】
